section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is the official style guide for Red Hat training and certification content, and for all other technical documentation except as stated. The guide includes everyday punctuation and grammar, common mistakes to avoid, strategies for translation and global audiences, and a word usage dictionary.
Red Hat product documentation by Customer Content Services (CCS) follows the Red Hat supplementary style guide at instead of this Red Hat Technical Writing Style Guide.
